verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

דַּבֵּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> Speak אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַהֲרֹ֜ן <S%H175><s%> unto Aaron וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to בָּנָ֗יו <S%H1121><s%> and unto his sons וְאֶל֙ <S%H413><s%> and to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> and unto all the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֖ <S%H559><s%> and say אֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> to זֶ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> This הַדָּבָ֔ר <S%H1697><s%> unto them This [is] the thing אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> hath commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> What אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> man מִבֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> soever [there be] of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who יִשְׁחַ֜ט <S%H7819><s%> that killeth שׁ֥וֹר <S%H7794><s%> an ox אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or כֶ֛שֶׂב <S%H3775><s%> or lamb אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or עֵ֖ז <S%H5795><s%> or goat בַּֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <S%H4264><s%> in the camp א֚וֹ <S%H176><s%> or אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who יִשְׁחַ֔ט <S%H7819><s%> or that killeth מִח֖וּץ <S%H2351><s%> [it] out לַֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <S%H4264><s%> of the camp

וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פֶּ֜תַח <S%H6607><s%> it not unto the door אֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵד֮ <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not הֱבִיאוֹ֒ <S%H935><s%> And bringeth לְהַקְרִ֤יב <S%H7126><s%> to offer קָרְבָּן֙ <S%H7133><s%> an offering לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before מִשְׁכַּ֣ן <S%H4908><s%> the tabernacle יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD דָּ֣ם <S%H1818><s%> blood יֵחָשֵׁ֞ב <S%H2803><s%> shall be imputed לָאִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> unto that man הַהוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he דָּ֣ם <S%H1818><s%> blood שָׁפָ֔ךְ <S%H8210><s%> he hath shed וְנִכְרַ֛ת <S%H3772><s%> shall be cut off הָאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and that man הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he מִקֶּ֥רֶב <S%H7130><s%> from among עַמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5971><s%> his people

לְמַעַן֩ <S%H4616><s%> the reason אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which יָבִ֜יאוּ <S%H935><s%> may bring בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> To the end that the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> זִבְחֵיהֶם֮ <S%H2077><s%> their sacrifices אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which הֵ֣ם <S%H1992><s%> they זֹבְחִים֮ <S%H2076><s%> which they offer עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> in the open הַשָּׂדֶה֒ <S%H7704><s%> field וֶֽהֱבִיאֻ֣ם <S%H935><s%> even that they may bring לַֽיהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> them unto the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> at פֶּ֛תַח <S%H6607><s%> unto the door אֹ֥הֶל <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֖ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַכֹּהֵ֑ן <S%H3548><s%> unto the priest וְזָ֨בְח֜וּ <S%H2076><s%> and offer זִבְחֵ֧י <S%H2077><s%> offerings שְׁלָמִ֛ים <S%H8002><s%> them [for] peace לַֽיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

וְזָרַ֨ק <S%H2236><s%> shall sprinkle הַכֹּהֵ֤ן <S%H3548><s%> And the priest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּם֙ <S%H1818><s%> the blood עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on מִזְבַּ֣ח <S%H4196><s%> upon the altar יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD פֶּ֖תַח <S%H6607><s%> [at] the door אֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation וְהִקְטִ֣יר <S%H6999><s%> and burn הַחֵ֔לֶב <S%H2459><s%> the fat לְרֵ֥יחַ <S%H7381><s%> savour נִיחֹ֖חַ <S%H5207><s%> for a sweet לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD

וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall no יִזְבְּח֥וּ <S%H2076><s%> And they shall no more offer עוֹד֙ <S%H5750><s%> longer אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זִבְחֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H2077><s%> their sacrifices לַשְּׂעִירִ֕ם <S%H8163><s%> unto devils אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> which הֵ֥ם <S%H1992><s%> they זֹנִ֖ים <S%H2181><s%> whom they have gone a whoring אַחֲרֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H310><s%> after חֻקַּ֥ת <S%H2708><s%> This shall be a statute עוֹלָ֛ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever תִּֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> become זֹּ֥את <S%H2063><s%> likewise לָהֶ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> like לְדֹרֹתָֽם׃ <S%H1755><s%> unto them throughout their generations

וַאֲלֵהֶ֣ם <S%H413><s%> then תֹּאמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> And thou shalt say אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> unto them Whatsoever man אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> man מִבֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> [there be] of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַגֵּ֖ר <S%H1616><s%> or of the strangers אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who יָג֣וּר <S%H1481><s%> which sojourn בְּתוֹכָ֑ם <S%H8432><s%> among אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who יַעֲלֶ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> you that offereth עֹלָ֖ה <S%H5930><s%> a burnt offering אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or זָֽבַח׃ <S%H2077><s%> or sacrifice

וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פֶּ֜תַח <S%H6607><s%> it not unto the door אֹ֤הֶל <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵד֙ <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and does not יְבִיאֶ֔נּוּ <S%H935><s%> And bringeth לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to offer אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> it unto the LORD וְנִכְרַ֛ת <S%H3772><s%> shall be cut off הָאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> even that man הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he מֵעַמָּֽיו׃ <S%H5971><s%> from among his people

וְאִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And whatsoever man אִ֜ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man מִבֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> [there be] of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַגֵּר֙ <S%H1616><s%> or of the strangers הַגָּ֣ר <S%H1481><s%> that sojourn בְּתוֹכָ֔ם <S%H8432><s%> among אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who יֹאכַ֖ל <S%H398><s%> you that eateth כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any דָּ֑ם <S%H1818><s%> any manner of blood וְנָתַתִּ֣י <S%H5414><s%> I will even set פָנַ֗י <S%H6440><s%> my face בַּנֶּ֙פֶשׁ֙ <S%H5315><s%> against that soul הָאֹכֶ֣לֶת <S%H398><s%> that eateth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּ֔ם <S%H1818><s%> blood וְהִכְרַתִּ֥י <S%H3772><s%> and will cut him off אֹתָ֖הּ <S%H853><s%> מִקֶּ֥רֶב <S%H7130><s%> from among עַמָּֽהּ׃ <S%H5971><s%> his people

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For נֶ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> For the life הַבָּשָׂר֮ <S%H1320><s%> of the flesh בַּדָּ֣ם <S%H1818><s%> [is] in the blood הִוא֒ <S%H1931><s%> he וַאֲנִ֞י <S%H589><s%> and I נְתַתִּ֤יו <S%H5414><s%> and I have given לָכֶם֙ עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <S%H4196><s%> it to you upon the altar לְכַפֵּ֖ר <S%H3722><s%> to make an atonement עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for נַפְשֹׁתֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H5315><s%> for your souls כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הַדָּ֥ם <S%H1818><s%> for it [is] the blood ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he בַּנֶּ֥פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> for the soul יְכַפֵּֽר׃ <S%H3722><s%> [that] maketh an atonement

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֤ן <S%H3651><s%> after that אָמַ֙רְתִּי֙ <S%H559><s%> Therefore I said לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner נֶ֥פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> No soul מִכֶּ֖ם <S%H4480><s%> among לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor תֹ֣אכַל <S%H398><s%> of you shall eat דָּ֑ם <S%H1818><s%> blood וְהַגֵּ֛ר <S%H1616><s%> neither shall any stranger הַגָּ֥ר <S%H1481><s%> that sojourneth בְּתוֹכְכֶ֖ם <S%H8432><s%> among לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor יֹ֥אכַל <S%H398><s%> you eat דָּֽם׃ <S%H1818><s%> blood ס

וְאִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And whatsoever man אִ֜ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man מִבְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> [there be] of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַגֵּר֙ <S%H1616><s%> or of the strangers הַגָּ֣ר <S%H1481><s%> that sojourn בְּתוֹכָ֔ם <S%H8432><s%> among אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which יָצ֜וּד <S%H6679><s%> you which hunteth צֵ֥יד <S%H6718><s%> and catcheth חַיָּ֛ה <S%H2416><s%> any beast אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or ע֖וֹף <S%H5775><s%> or fowl אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which יֵאָכֵ֑ל <S%H398><s%> that may be eaten וְשָׁפַךְ֙ <S%H8210><s%> he shall even pour אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דָּמ֔וֹ <S%H1818><s%> out the blood וְכִסָּ֖הוּ <S%H3680><s%> thereof and cover בֶּעָפָֽר׃ <S%H6083><s%> it with dust

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for נֶ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> For [it is] the life כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all בָּשָׂ֗ר <S%H1320><s%> of all flesh דָּמ֣וֹ <S%H1818><s%> the blood בְנַפְשׁוֹ֮ <S%H5315><s%> of it [is] for the life הוּא֒ <S%H1931><s%> I וָֽאֹמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> thereof therefore I said לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel דַּ֥ם <S%H1818><s%> the blood כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of any בָּשָׂ֖ר <S%H1320><s%> of no manner of flesh לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> are not תֹאכֵ֑לוּ <S%H398><s%> Ye shall eat כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for נֶ֤פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> for the life כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all בָּשָׂר֙ <S%H1320><s%> of all flesh דָּמ֣וֹ <S%H1818><s%> [is] the blood הִ֔וא <S%H1931><s%> he כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> whoever אֹכְלָ֖יו <S%H398><s%> thereof whosoever eateth יִכָּרֵֽת׃ <S%H3772><s%> it shall be cut off

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> any נֶ֗פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> And every soul אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after תֹּאכַ֤ל <S%H398><s%> that eateth נְבֵלָה֙ <S%H5038><s%> that which died וּטְרֵפָ֔ה <S%H2966><s%> [of itself] or that which was torn בָּאֶזְרָ֖ח <S%H249><s%> [with beasts whether it be] one of your own country וּבַגֵּ֑ר <S%H1616><s%> or a stranger וְכִבֶּ֨ס <S%H3526><s%> he shall both wash בְּגָדָ֜יו <S%H899><s%> his clothes וְרָחַ֥ץ <S%H7364><s%> and bathe בַּמַּ֛יִם <S%H4325><s%> [himself] in water וְטָמֵ֥א <S%H2930><s%> and be unclean עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הָעֶ֖רֶב <S%H6153><s%> until the even וְטָהֵֽר׃ <S%H2891><s%> then shall he be clean

וְאִם֙ <S%H518><s%> if לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יְכַבֵּ֔ס <S%H3526><s%> But if he wash וּבְשָׂר֖וֹ <S%H1320><s%> his flesh לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> or יִרְחָ֑ץ <S%H7364><s%> [them] not nor bathe וְנָשָׂ֖א <S%H5375><s%> then he shall bear עֲוֹנֽוֹ׃ <S%H5771><s%> his iniquity פ
